name: Beat of the Heart
description:
Beat of the Heart is an action rhythm game where you pose with your emotions in battle!

This was accomplished for Game Jam Plus 22/23
Our chosen theme was: "Expressing Yourself" "Easy to Play, Hard to be good"

Team members:

  • Richmond Ngo - Programming - https://addictedcode.itch.io
  • Paolo Roxas - Sound, Music, Programming - https://paksuuu.itch.io/
  • Philip Villaluz - Design, Programming - me!
  • John Magallanes - Art, Animation - https://tw1ntails.itch.io/

Credits: 

  • Font -  Alagard.font
  • Sound and Music - sfxr, Bosca Ceoil
  • Used for model textures: https://szadiart.itch.io/rpg-worlds-ca
  • Used for VFX: POLYGON - Particle FX Pack
  • Special thanks to: Crocotile 3D by Alex Hanson-White
